metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39371 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An XML external entity (XXE) injection in PyWPS before 4.4.5 allows anattacker to view files on the application server filesystem by assigning apath to the entity. OWSLib 0.24.1 may also be affected.

criterions.comment: pywps: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
